short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your most sentimental pictures in your default tab, uploaded by you and randomly shown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you bored of your current plain New Tab background? Do you cherish your memories and would like to see them on your background? Do you need the simplest productivity enhancer? 

Enjoy the clean, sleek, and minimalistic Custom New Tab. Not only will you have unlimited different background themes, but you will also enjoy a delightful surprise whenever you open a new tab. This will not only increase your productivity, but also remind you of your most meaningful images.

Usage Instructions:
1. Click on of 12 buttons on top to select your color scheme. Pick your own primary/secondary colors with the black 'T' button.
2. Open Gallery.
3. Choose and Upload desired images
4. You're all set. Refresh the page and enjoy.
5. If you ever need to jot down a quick note, don't waste paper and simply save it on a new tab!

Full Specs:
     - Among all photos that you upload, one is randomly chosen every time you open a new tab, surprising you each time and reminding you of your favorite pictures, all kept privately
     - Notepad for productivity enhancement, in case you need to take a note of something
     - Your top 10 most visited websites displayed to be one click away
     - Option for you to unleash your creativity with your own choice of colors
     - 11 pre-set beautiful themes that appeal to anyone's liking
     - Locally stored images, so all your pictures are kept privately on your computer
     - Regional date and time to always keep you updated with the option to use 12 or 24-hour clock
     
     
First 500 installs will be free.


Leave a comment for any questions or issues.
